      • fill

        public HDrawable fill(int clr)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the fill for this drawable. This method takes in a standard Processing color integer, which are commonly represented as `0xAARRGGBB` or `#RRGGBB`.
        Overrides:
        fill in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        clr - The new fill for this drawable.
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.fill(int,int), HDrawable.fill(int,int,int), HDrawable.fill(int,int,int,int)

      • fill

        public HDrawable fill(int clr,
                      int alpha)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the fill for this drawable. The `clr` parameter is a standard Processing color integer and alpha is any number from 0 to 255. Note that `alpha` would override the existing alpha value of `clr`. So if `clr` is `0x80FFFFFF` and `alpha` is `0x40`, the fill will become `0x40FFFFFF`.
        Overrides:
        fill in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        clr - The new fill for this drawable, excluding its alpha value.
        alpha - The alpha for the new fill for this drawable.
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.fill(int), HDrawable.fill(int,int,int), HDrawable.fill(int,int,int,int), HDrawable.noFill()

      • fill

        public HDrawable fill(int r,
                      int g,
                      int b)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the fill for this drawable. The parameters `r`, `g` and `b` can be any number from 0 to 255.
        Overrides:
        fill in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        r - The red component for the new fill for this drawable
        g - The green component for the new fill for this drawable
        b - The blue component for the new fill for this drawable
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.fill(int), HDrawable.fill(int,int), HDrawable.fill(int,int,int,int), HDrawable.noFill()

        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the fill for this drawable. The parameters `r`, `g`, `b` and `a` can be any number from 0 to 255.

        Parameters:

        b - The blue component for the new fill for this drawable

      • paintAll

        public void paintAll(PGraphics g,
                     boolean usesZ,
                     float currAlphaPc)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Prepares the environment for drawing this drawable and its children. This method is primarily called internally during the draw cycle and probably wouldn't need to be called directly.
        Overrides:
        paintAll in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for this drawable.
        usesZ - Indicates if z-coordinates are used.
        currAlphaPc - The current alpha value in the draw cycle.

      • draw

        public void draw(PGraphics g,
                 boolean b,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float p)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Draws this drawable. This method is abstract and is meant to be implemented by the children of this class. Also, this method is primarily called internally during the draw cycle and probably wouldn't need to be called directly.
        Specified by:
        draw in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for this drawable.
        b - Indicates if z-coordinates are used.
        x - The x coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        y - The y coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        p - The current alpha value in the draw cycle.

      • createCopy

        public HDrawable createCopy()
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Creates a copy of this drawable. This method is abstract and is meant to be implemented by the children of this class.
        Specified by:
        createCopy in class HDrawable
        Returns:
        A copy of this drawable.
